display_long_description:
**Forge your path. Rewrite fate. Become a god.**

Street Gods is a physical VR action rogue-lite set in a shattered New York City where the Nine Realms of Norse myth have crashed into the modern world. Ancient power floods the streets. Reality is breaking. And Mjolnir has chosen you.

Drawn into a divine war, you’ll fight to restore what’s been lost. Battle gods and monsters, uncover forgotten secrets, and shape your legend one run at a time.

**Wield Mjolnir with real weight and force**

Feel the weight. Hear the crack. Every throw, recall, and slam hits with true physical impact. Mjolnir reacts instantly to your hands, turning every fight into a blur of thunder and destruction.

[media]

**Your route. Your run. Your legend.**

Shape your route across a collapsing New York. Place city blocks on a mystical Tafl board and carve your own path through shifting streets packed with enemies, upgrades, and hidden trials. Every run is unique. Every choice changes the fight.

[media]

**Face towering enemies and mythical bosses**

From corrupted Jotunn to divine champions, every boss is a test of strength and skill. Learn their moves. Break their patterns. Earn your power the hard way.

[media]

**Ascend with god-like powers**

Norse gods. New York grit.  Street Gods fuses heavy metal energy with comic-book physics-driven combat that feels as good as it looks.

Collect ancient runes, forge new abilities, and grow stronger with every session. Unlock fire, frost, and lightning attacks. Chain combos, break shields, and ascend from mortal to myth.

[media]
